thread.title: Angola: Sonangol and Total Reinforce Partnership
thread.title_full: Angola: Sonangol and Total Reinforce Partnership

title: Angola: Sonangol and Total Reinforce Partnership
text:
South Africa: Govt in Bid to Educate Millions Without Grade 9 
The Chairperson of Sonangol, Francisco de Lemos, invites French people to invest in Angola, sharing risk and contributing to the development and diversification of the Angolan economy. 
This may be a modest French contribution to the Angolan government's efforts in support of economic diversification, creating jobs and wealth, he said. 
He announced that the strengthening of the partnership with TOTAL seeks to bring about the fourth "boom" in oil production in Angola. 
The Director General of TOTAL said that he became a petroleum engineer in Angola and is impressed at how Angolans managed to meet the country's development needs. Angola
